channel.title: xor encoding on Pablo de Juan Fidalgo

item.title: Malware Functionality - Data Encoding
item.description: Table of Contents Notes Simple Ciphers XOR NULL-Preserving Single-Byte XOR Encoding Other Simple Encoding Schemes Common Cryptographic Algorithms Searching for High-Entropy Content Labs Lab 1 Lab 2 Lab 3 Notes A malware author might use a layer of encoding for these purposes: To hide configuration information, such as a command-and-control domain. To save information to a staging file before stealing it. To store strings used by the malware and decode them just before they are needed.
